short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud-based clipboard manager. Share clips with your team, paste to any computer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cloud-based clipboard manager

Use the PasteAway client apps for Windows and Mac to:
* Retrieve available clips from the cloud.
* Quickly find the clip you want.
* Paste it into any application.
* Easily create cloud-clips from local clipboard content.

Use the PasteAway web-application to:
* Manage your clips in the cloud.
* Set quick keys & tags.
* Manage projects and team members.
